    • Method Detail

      • generateScramble

        public static java.lang.String generateScramble()
        Returns:
        a randomly generated 25-move scramble

      • getRandomDirection

        private static java.lang.String getRandomDirection()
        Returns:
        a random element from the directions array

      • getRandomFace

        private static java.lang.String getRandomFace(java.lang.String penultimate,
                             java.lang.String last)
        Parameters:
        penultimate - the penultimate move in the scramble
        last - the last move in the scramble
        Returns:
        a random face whose direction of motion is in the same axis compared with the penultimate and last moves. For example, R L F would be an acceptable series of moves because the directions of motion of these moves is x x z. U D U' would not be acceptable because the directions of motion of these moves is y y y, which are all the same so a new move must be generated.

      • isSameAxis

        private static boolean isSameAxis(java.lang.String a,
                 java.lang.String b,
                 java.lang.String c)
        Parameters:
        a - the first move with its associated rotation direction
        b - the second move with its associated rotation direction
        c - the third move with its associated rotation direction
        Returns:
        true if the three moves are in the same axis;
        false otherwise
